name: Belly of a Beast
description:
***IMPORTANT NOTE***
Game may start muted, be sure to un-mute before starting.
Music might not play on Macs

Made for "No Code Jam"
https://itch.io/jam/nocodejam-1
Hosted by the "SDC" (Sacramento Developers Collective)

A short narrative adventure game made with RPG Maker.

Music by "Sleffy" (SoundCloud / BandCamp / Twitter)
Game by "ReimJ" (me)
